Description: The drivetrain will support tank drive.
The drivetrain will support arcade drive.
The claw will support being opened.
The claw will support being closed.
The claw holder will support being manually driven.
The claw holder will support a preset position for loading cones.
The claw holder will support a preset position for stacking cones.
The lift will support being driven manually.
The lift will support a preset position for loading cones from the ground.
The lift will support a preset position for loading cones from the auto loader.
The lift will support a preset position for mobile goal stacking on top of 0-2 cones
The lift will support a preset position for mobile goal stacking on top of 3-4 cones
The lift will support a preset position for mobile goal stacking on top of 5-6 cones.
The lift will support a preset position for mobile goal stacking on top of the stationary goal.
The goal intake will support being manually driven.
The goal intake will support an up position preset.
The goal intake will support a down position preset.
The autonomous program will support driving to a set distance or rotation.
The autonomous program will support opening the claw.
The autonomous program will support closing the claw.
The autonomous program will support moving the lift to its floor loading preset.
The autonomous program will support moving the lift to its auto loader preset.
The autonomous program will support moving the lift to its low stacking preset.
The autonomous program will support moving the lift to its mid stacking preset.
The autonomous program will support moving the lift to its high stacking preset.
The autonomous program will support moving the lift to its stationary goal preset.
The autonomous program will support moving the goal intake to its up preset.
The autonomous program will support moving the goal intake to its down preset.
The autonomous program will support moving the claw holder to its loading preset.
The auontomous program will support moving the claw holder to its stacking preset.
